body:
A script, snippet, gist and knowledge repo for sysadmins & developers working with mdid3

Check the wiki for guides, tips, &c.:  https://github.com/hanleybrand/mdid3-sysadmin/wiki/_pages

***

## Generic, non-platform specific

[Updating mdid3 with git & bash](https://github.com/hanleybrand/mdid3-sysadmin/wiki/Updating-mdid3-with-git-via-bash)

## Ubuntu 10.0.4

[Installing mdid3 on an Ubuntu VM](https://github.com/hanleybrand/mdid3-sysadmin/wiki/Installing-mdid3-on-an-Ubuntu-VM)

## Redhat Enterprise Linux 5.8

[Installing mdid3 on Redhat Enterprise Linux 5.ish](https://github.com/hanleybrand/mdid3-sysadmin/wiki/Installing-mdid3-on-Redhat-Enterprise-Linux-5.ish)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A script, snippet, gist and knowledge repo for sysadmins & developers working with mdid3
name: Mdid3-sysadmin
